news_header: A 27-year-old man has been arrested in the U.S. for allegedly planning a terrorist attack on Election Day, involving an underage accomplice.
news_text: The FBI has arrested a 27-year-old man suspected of planning a terrorist attack on November 5, Election Day. The individual, who immigrated from Afghanistan in 2021, confessed during interrogations that he intended to target a large public gathering. An underage person was also involved in the planning and has been apprehended. The suspects were caught after acquiring AK-47 rifles and ammunition. The man is believed to have connections to the ISIS terrorist organization.
